name: Auto-Caption & Post Videos to Instagram & TikTok with Submagic, Postiz & OpenAI
description:
# üé• Auto-Caption & Autopost Videos to Instagram & TikTok

## Description
Automatisez votre pipeline de contenu court ! Ce flux de travail prend n'importe quelle vid√©o t√©l√©charg√©e dans un dossier Google Drive sp√©cifique, g√©n√®re des l√©gendes engageantes avec Submagic, puis publie automatiquement la vid√©o termin√©e (avec des l√©gendes g√©n√©r√©es par IA) directement sur Instagram ou TikTok via Postiz. Les l√©gendes sont ensuite affin√©es avec OpenAI pour un texte social pr√™t √† la marque. Enfin, chaque vid√©o publi√©e est enregistr√©e dans une feuille Google pour le suivi.

üëâ Regardez la construction √©tape par √©tape de ce flux de travail sur : www.youtube.com/@automatewithmarc

## Comment √ßa fonctionne

D√©clencheur Google Drive ‚Äì D√©tecte les nouveaux t√©l√©chargements de vid√©os.

Attendre + Interroger ‚Äì Surveille l'√©tat du travail jusqu'√† ce que la vid√©o l√©gend√©e soit pr√™te.

T√©l√©charger la vid√©o ‚Äì R√©cup√®re la vid√©o l√©gend√©e termin√©e.

T√©l√©charger sur Postiz ‚Äì Envoie le fichier √† Postiz pour une publication multi-plateforme.

Agent de l√©gende (OpenAI) ‚Äì G√©n√®re des l√©gendes optimis√©es pour Instagram/TikTok.

Mettre √† jour le journal ‚Äì Enregistre les d√©tails de la vid√©o, les l√©gendes et l'√©tat dans Google Sheets.

## Pourquoi vous allez l'adorer

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert Instagram caption writer.
Your task is to take the image prompt provided by the user and generate a short, engaging caption that encourages parents and children to try Larrydoodle ‚Äî a free online doodle drawing creator for kids. With Larrydoodle, children can design custom coloring pages, print them out, and start coloring instantly.

Caption Guidelines
Keep captions short, playful, and engaging for parents and kids.
Emphasize the fun, creativity, and ease of using Larrydoodle.
Rotate the call-to-action (CTA) across posts, using one of these variations:
Create your own custom coloring pages for free today at larrydoodle.com
Try it free and start creating now
Comment below what you created and share your creations with us by tagging #larrydoodle or tagging us in your Instagram Stories (make it lively and inviting)

Tone: friendly, imaginative, and encouraging.

Output Rules
Do not use special characters like {} ! %$&*
Return only one final caption per request.
Do not include explanations or formatting outside of the caption itself.

parameters.content:
üé• Auto-Caption & Autopost Videos to Instagram & TikTok

Description
Automate your short-form content pipeline! This workflow takes any video uploaded to a specific Google Drive folder, generates engaging captions with Submagic, and then auto-posts the finished video (with AI-generated captions) directly to Instagram or TikTok via Postiz. Captions are further refined with OpenAI for brand-ready social text. Finally, each published video is logged into a Google Sheet for tracking.

üëâ Watch step-by-step build of this workflow on: www.youtube.com/@automatewithmarc

How It Works

Google Drive Trigger ‚Äì Detects new video uploads.

Submagic API ‚Äì Adds styled captions automatically.

Wait + Poll ‚Äì Monitors job status until the captioned video is ready.

Download Video ‚Äì Retrieves the finished captioned video.

Upload to Postiz ‚Äì Sends the file to Postiz for multi-platform posting.

Caption Agent (OpenAI) ‚Äì Generates optimized Instagram/TikTok captions.

Post to Instagram/TikTok ‚Äì Publishes the video with caption.

Update Log ‚Äì Saves video details, captions, and status into Google Sheets.

Why You‚Äôll Love It

‚ö° Hands-off publishing ‚Äî videos go from raw to posted automatically.

üìù AI captions + Submagic styling ‚Äî engaging text and visual consistency.

üìä Content tracking ‚Äî every post logged in Google Sheets.

üéØ Perfect for Reels & TikToks ‚Äî optimized for fast workflows and social reach.

Requirements

Google Drive account

Submagic API key

Postiz account (for IG/TikTok posting)

OpenAI API key (for caption generation)

Google Sheets account

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
